Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>運命の輪<White>……？ どういう意味だ？
Entry.EnglishText: The <Cyan>Wheel of Fortune<White>? What does that mean?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>希望<White>、あるいは<Yellow>絶望<White>……つまり私たちには 両極端なふたつの道しか残されていないの。
Entry.EnglishText: <Yellow>Hope<White>, and also <Yellow>Despair<White>... So basically, the two divergent paths which lie before us.

Entry.JapaneseText: ユリスを倒し、世界を希望の光で照らし出すか、 私たちが戦いに敗れ、世界を消滅させるか……
Entry.EnglishText: Whether we defeat Yuris and the light of hope shines down on the world, or we lose and the world is destroyed...

Entry.JapaneseText: 絶望か希望……世界の運命を左右する…… ふたつの分かれ道か……
Entry.EnglishText: Hope or Despair... This is the crossroad that will decide the fate of the world...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、私たちが掴み取るのは……希望よ。 明日生まれてくる子たちが笑えるように……
Entry.EnglishText: But, what we have taken into our hands... is hope. So that the children of the future will be able to smile...
